name: Visual Studio Code
description: My primary code editor for all development work. Excellent extensions ecosystem and built-in Git integration.
howToUse: I use it with extensions like GitLens, Python, Docker, and REST Client. The integrated terminal and Git features save me hours daily.

name: Docker
description: Containerization platform that I use for consistent development environments and deployment.
howToUse: I create Dockerfiles for all my projects and use docker-compose for local development. Essential for ensuring consistency across environments.

name: Prometheus
description: Open-source monitoring and alerting toolkit that I use for system metrics and performance tracking.
howToUse: I set up Prometheus to collect metrics from my applications and infrastructure, then use Grafana for visualization and alerting.

name: Figma
description: Collaborative design tool that I use for system architecture diagrams and UI mockups.
howToUse: I create system architecture diagrams, user flow maps, and UI wireframes. The collaboration features make it easy to work with stakeholders.

name: Notion
description: All-in-one workspace that I use for project management, documentation, and knowledge sharing.
howToUse: I organize all my project documentation, meeting notes, and technical specifications here. The database features help me track progress and decisions.

name: Postman
description: API development and testing platform that I use for testing endpoints and documenting APIs.
howToUse: I create collections for each API I work with, set up environment variables, and use the testing features to validate endpoints.

name: Grafana
description: Data visualization and analytics platform that I use with Prometheus for monitoring dashboards.
howToUse: I connect it to Prometheus and other data sources to create custom dashboards for system health, performance metrics, and business KPIs.

name: Draw.io
description: Free online diagram software that I use for quick system architecture sketches and flowcharts.
howToUse: I use it for quick system design sketches, database schemas, and process flowcharts. It integrates well with Google Drive and GitHub.
